document_data.caption: A map showing the Guard Smithy (labeled 47) near Soldier's Street.
document_data.name: Guard Smithy
document_data.mainbody: The '''Guard Smithy''' was a civic building located in [[Waterdeep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The building stood two storys tall.
document_data.Location: The Guard Smithy was located in the far southern section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Castle Ward|Castle Ward]] just northeast of [[Soldier's Street]] near its intersection with [[Soothsayer's Way]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Castle Ward}}
